name: Suicide Biker
description:
You're a cyclist with a passion for danger and extreme sports with less than stellar survival ratings! Dodge traffic as it merges and grab coins to nab the high score and beat your pathetic friends.

Controls: Alternate left and right arrows to peddle your bike.

A and D to move left and right. Grab the coins, avoid the cars, and avoid becoming roadkill!

Art - @Monkeyfox

Programming - @Almightyzentaco @Vincent

Sounds - Generated with BFXR, Drones from 99sounds.org, Misc sounds from GameDev Market RPG Humble Bundle.

Music - Title Song - @Almightyzentaco, Main Song - URL Melt by Unicorn Heads https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbDplVvtIq05AdyYKjVSUIw

Fonts - A Gobin Appears and Vermin Vibes by Chequered Ink
